uk.co.crider.jablus.data.store

Class RandomLineAccessFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.crider.jablus.data.store.RandomLineAccessFile

  • public class RandomLineAccessFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows simultaneous line-wise reading and writing of data Read access is random, while write access is sequential
